verbs.description: [ARG0: royal caribbean cruise ship] [V: hits] [ARG1: rough weather returns] to port a royal caribbean cruise ship that was slated to arrive at port canaveral monday afternoon is sailing back to it original port after hitting rough weather on sunday which sent the ship swaying forcing gabriella lairson cape liberty the bahamas twitter wnbc shara strand port royal caribbean international ocean city new jersey robert huschka cruise ship queens
